title: Coventry edge 10-man Reading in five-goal thriller
shortDescription: Relegation-threatened Reading marked their 150th club anniversary with another Sky Bet Championship defeat as they were beaten 3-2 by Coventry at the SCL Stadium.

title: Southampton hold Man Utd at Old Trafford
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Manchester United's draw with Southampton in the Premier League.

title: Ten-man Forest snatch late point from Stoke
shortDescription: Ryan Yates scored a stoppage-time equaliser to salvage a 2-2 draw for 10-man Nottingham Forest following a dramatic finale against Stoke at the City Ground.

title: Millwall battle past Cardiff
shortDescription: Mason Bennett stepped from the bench to seal a 2-1 victory for Millwall over Cardiff that gave the hosts their first win in three games.

title: Boro cruise past Derby
shortDescription: Middlesbrough moved into the Sky Bet Championship play-off places with a resounding 4-1 victory over Derby at the Riverside Stadium.

title: Mitro equals Championship record as Fulham edge Hull
shortDescription: Fulham strengthened their position at the top of the Sky Bet Championship with a 1-0 win at Hull.

title: Bournemouth stay on track after late turnaround
shortDescription: Siriki Dembele was Bournemouth's hero as his strike with just seconds remaining handed his side a potentially precious 2-1 win at in-form Blackpool.

title: Quina fires Barnsley to first win since November
shortDescription: Domingos Quina's second-half goal helped relegation-threatened Barnsley beat promotion-chasing QPR 1-0 and end a 13-game winless streak in the Championship.

title: Lampard's Everton thrash Leeds
shortDescription: FREE TO WATCH: Highlights from Everton's win over Leeds in the Premier League.

title: Birmingham cruise to win amid further fan protests
shortDescription: Three new signings scored as Birmingham brushed off the latest display of supporter unrest to claim an impressive 3-0 win over play-off chasing Luton at St Andrew's.

title: Superb Maupay strike helps Brighton see off Watford
shortDescription: A superb Neal Maupay strike helped Brighton to a 2-0 win against relegation-threatened Watford as Roy Hodgson lost his first game at Vicarage Road.

title: Everton ease past Leeds to give Lampard first PL win
shortDescription: Frank Lampard secured his first Premier League win as Everton manager as his side beat Leeds 3-0 at Goodison Park.

title: Euro: Bayern suffer shock thrashing by Bochum
shortDescription: Bundesliga leaders Bayern Munich slipped to a shock 4-2 defeat at VfL Bochum on Saturday, conceding all four goals in the first half.

title: Rangnick: Man Utd need to be more nasty | Merson: Things need to change quickly
shortDescription: Ralf Rangnick wants more aggression and nastiness from his players after Manchester United blew another half-time lead to draw 1-1 with Southampton.

title: Huddersfield goal contentiously disallowed in Sheff Utd draw
shortDescription: Huddersfield and Sheffield United drew 0-0 on Saturday lunchtime, in a game overshadowed by a controversially disallowed goal for the hosts.

title: Man Utd held by Saints after losing lead again
shortDescription: Manchester United let another half-time lead slip as they were held to a 1-1 draw by Southampton at Old Trafford.

title: All of Saturday's scores and results
shortDescription: Keep up-to-date with all the latest scores and fixtures at home and abroad, including Premier League, EFL, Scottish Cup and all the latest from across Europe...

title: Four red cards shown in melee between Porto and Sporting!
shortDescription: A melee saw four red cards issued at the end of Porto's 2-2 Primeira Liga match with Sporting on Friday.

title: Papers: Poch wants Kane at Man Utd
shortDescription: All the top stories and transfer rumours from Saturday's national newspapers...

title: 'Arsenal got away with one' | Should Chelsea have had pen?
shortDescription: Arsenal remain two points ahead of Chelsea at the top of the WSL after a draw but should there have been a late penalty awarded to the home side?
